did.unittitle: Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists
did.abstract: The Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists consist of 2 bound volumes with invitation lists that include the name and address of various invitees to events.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mary Adelaide Scott Pierrepont, 1974.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Each of the two volumes is housed in its own folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists, 1978.059, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Mrs. Robert Low Pierrepont invitation lists consist of 2 bound volumes with invitation lists that include the name and address of various invitees to events hosted by Mrs. Pierrepont, the wife of Robert E. Pierrepont, a prominent banker.
